Title: Carrier
Plot: After living for 8 years in an alternate world that only Tom and Alana remember the world with the 4400 has returned as it was at the second the 8 years started. A 30 year old 4400 woman wakes up and finds everybody else in her local community dead. Maia puts April's love for her to a test.
GuestStars: Craig March,  Sean Devine,  Daniel Bacon,  Jason  Benson,  Daniella Evangelista,  Matias  Hacker,  Sage Brocklebank,  David Purvis,  Julius Chapple,  Sherilyn Fenn
